Lab: CT max of long-term domesticated fish was measured using the AB-WT laboratory-strain zebrafish, which have been kept under controlled laboratory conditions (26–28°C) for more than 40 years. These fish are therefore the result of more than 70 generations ( Howe et al., 2013 ) kept at stable environmental conditions, which may have selected against a wide thermal tolerance ( n = 20, experiment performed in February 2018 at NTNU; Fig. 2).
